explanation: BTC sentiment is overwhelmingly bullish across multiple chat participants. Many users report taking profits, new entries, and holding through volatility. Despite some short-term sellers and warnings of traps, the majority anticipate further upward movement, referencing support at 108k, targets up to 109k, and FOMO buying. There are also comments about BTC being undervalued, strong upward momentum, and anticipation of new highs. There is little technical skepticism, and even those with short entries or stop losses seem to suggest patience rather than panic. The combination of FOMO, bullish calls, and confirmation from many participants, alongside references to market structure and resistance levels being broken, supports a high-confidence buy signal. Risk management is advised due to some mentions of volatility and traps, but leverage up to 20x is considered safe by several traders.
